pages.text: Welcome to CreatePunk! This book will show you all the ins and outs of everything you need to know to get going in the modpack. There's a lot of information, so I've tried to condense it down as much as possible.$(br2)Entries and categories are generally sorted in the order that they should be read, but that's more of a guideline than anything else.

Feel free to skip around and read at your own pace. Important concepts will be linked to when they are mentioned, and while this book is open, the game will pause if you are playing in Singleplayer.$(br2)This book assumes knowledge of Vanilla mechanics, but does not assume any experience with Modded Minecraft.

pages.title: Navigating this Book
pages.text: As you read through this book, you will notice several different colors and styles of text. Text highlighted magenta refers to $(item)Items/$ or $(item)Blocks/$, while green text refers to generic $(thing)Concepts/$. Bold black text usually refers to $(bold)Keybindings/$ or important information, while blue text are $(bold)$(l:getting_started)Links/$ which can be clicked on.
In case you want to save specific entries to come back to later, you can bookmark them by pressiong the $(bold)+/$ icon in the top right of the book while an entry is open.
